fields.name: Expiration Date
fields.options:
formula="IF(
  {fldNaFrJ8iY7gjObX} < 8,
    DATEADD({fldIQpsVznOfPvJwh}, 2, 'months'),
    IF(
      AND({fldNaFrJ8iY7gjObX} >= 8, {fldNaFrJ8iY7gjObX} < 12),
        DATEADD({fldIQpsVznOfPvJwh}, 4, 'months'),
        DATEADD({fldIQpsVznOfPvJwh}, 6, 'months')
    )
)" is_valid=True referenced_field_ids=['fldNaFrJ8iY7gjObX', 'fldIQpsVznOfPvJwh'] result=DateFieldConfig(type='date', options=DateFieldOptions(date_format=DateFormat(format='LL', name='friendly')))
